# Sample Description

Recruitment sources include: (1) University Health Services at UW-Madison and other area colleges and universities (2) flyers at area businesses (e.g. fitness centers, coffee shops) (3) local mental health providers, including providers within Wisconsin Psychiatric Institute and Clinic (WisPIC) as well as other University of Wisconsin - Madison health clinics, as well as outside of the UW settings (e.g., at Community Mental Health Centers, private practices, etc.) (4) online advertisement on social media platforms (5) direct, peer-to-peer recruitment by peer facilitators, (6) campus e-mail recruitment.
